definition: To construct or create something by assembling various materials or components, typically used in the context of creating buildings, structures, or other physical objects.

examples.english: I want to build a house.

examples.german: Wir werden ein neues Bürogebäude bauen.
examples.english: We will build a new office building.

examples.german: Sie bauen ein Boot aus Holz.
examples.english: They are building a wooden boat.

examples.german: Das Unternehmen plant, eine Fabrik zu bauen.
examples.english: The company plans to construct a factory.
